website_summaries.verdict: These sporty sneakers offer a colorful alternative to basic black work shoes. Comfortable and moderately supportive. Similar to Trickel.
pros: Specifically designed with health care workers in mind
Holds up to food dropped by service workers
Sporty work sneaker with relaxed fit and memory foam cushioning
Mesh fabric upper with synthetic trim
Rubber toe guards.Heel panel fabric overlay with pull-on top tab
Lightweight Flexsole midsole is flexible and shock-absorbing
cons: Not a lot of arch support

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: The product looks and fits awesome! BUT after working my office/plebotomy/medical assistant job my feet have never been in so much pain. I thought it was just me having to break them in at first but no. It's been about two weeks and after I get home every night I think it would be less painful to rip my feet off. Awesome looking shoe but not that good on comfort.
customer_reviews.author: casey

customer_reviews.title: Love. This
customer_reviews.text: I. Love. This. Shoe. I am an RN in a busy hospital. I always get some sort of bodily fluid on my feet, so I always stuck with waterproof clogs. But truthfully, they weren't comfortable. I always preferred sneakers. With these I get the best of both worlds! Waterproof sneakers!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda K. B

customer_reviews.title: The cutest shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: I have received compliments everyday that I have worn these shoes. Comfy and slip proof. Great for work and walking my dog. *Update* I wore through all the pading on my doggie shoes (but not disappointed, I walk about 7 miles a day in them and they had a good run...) Came back for the kitty shoes. I can't write a new review so I'm still 5 star impressed. These are so comfy. No break in time needed, even with no show socks. I have had no pain or blisters and my friends and feet are loving them.
customer_reviews.author: Julias@Daytona

customer_reviews.title: very uncomfortable and not so durable
customer_reviews.text: For the first time I used Amazon wardrobe order where I could try for 7 days, keep what I wanted, and return what I didn't. I bought these shoes because I needed durable yet comfortable shoes. I have always enjoyed my Sketchers shoes prior to this purchase. After wearing for about three weeks the toe reinforcement is starting to peel. They are very heavy and not so comfortable. Durability seems to be limited as well since they are already falling apart. Way too expensive for this to happen so early on a brand new pair of shoes. Probably won't use Amazon wardrobe again.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes!!! Every pair of slip resistant shoes I've had to wear for work ended up killing my feet and leaving them with blisters. These shoes are wonderful!!! They are comfortable enough to wear for a twelve hour shift without my back hurting and no blisters or foot pain. The slip resistance is so much better than any of my coworkers shoes. They still slip around at times while I can walk around with no issues at all. And added bonus they come in fun colors and not just bland all black or all white!!! All my coworkers asked where I got them and I sent them right to you.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly matsko

customer_reviews.title: Cute. . . Skechers!
customer_reviews.text: After a few months? These things still kill my feet! So unusual for Skechers, but there is so little cush for my foot! The ball of my foot is literally bruised from wearing them in my kitchen. I'm a real Skechers fan . . . Just not these
customer_reviews.author: Charm

customer_reviews.title: Very stiff and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Ordered my true size and they ran a little small and tight. These were very very uncomfortable the first time I wore them. I gave them a second try and they killed my feet. Reviews were good but they didn't work for me. I bartend and cocktail serve 10 hours a night and my feet felt horrible at the end of my shift. Will try something new. Love Sketchers brand. Bummer of a shoe for me.
customer_reviews.author: Simone Springer

customer_reviews.title: Very Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy comfy work shoe. I have arthritis in both feet and ankles so it's a guarantee my feet are going to hurt at the end of a shift. My point is how much and how long. These shoes in conjunction with compression socks are wonderful. Within the hour of getting home the ache is gone. I have even been able to forego my usual anti-inflammatory meds which is good news for my stomach. I have wide feet and bought wide width and they took very little to break in. They also come with a second set of shoe laces which I thought was pretty neat.
customer_reviews.author: Dassah

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, poor support
customer_reviews.text: I have had these less than a month and they are already cracked and separating. There is very little support and they are cheaply made. Not at all the quality I expect from Skechers.
customer_reviews.author: Erica-Lynn

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair. The 1st pair I had I ordered in a 7 1/2 and they looked big. Kept them anyways and loved them. I’m a florist so I’m on my feet all day. I decided to get a size 7 this time and they fit better. Just got them in today but they should hopefully feel great like the old ones when I break them in.
customer_reviews.author: AngNatMom

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this pair of shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I use these daily as a nurse 3-12hr shifts plus OT and this is the 2nd pair I've bought. I tried other sketchers, I've tried clogs, I've tried fila....and I will keep coming back to this sketchers style. I like that it has plastic film covering behind the shoe (4 the days u just want to kick it off and not unti ur shoe) & it has plastic in the front for extra friction & water protection. I get compliments from pts all the time about the colors. In a time of an emergency I'm not going 2 b able 2 run in clogs hence why I buy this shoe. Love it. Wont use another brand or style. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Roxana

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead and get extra insoles.
customer_reviews.text: If you decide to get these go ahead and do yourself a favor and get some extra insoles to replace the ones they come with. They are very uncomfortable. I wore them 1 day and my feet were killing me. It seemed as if 1 shoe was way smaller than the other and my toe was crammed all day long. I got home and switched the insoles out for a better memory foam one and it instantly fixed the toe jamming. Super cute shoe pattern. Hopefully they will break in more and be a tad less stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Dacey Miller

customer_reviews.title: well made,extras are really included, highly comfortable, a true wide,exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: They are so durable and sturdy. I love the cat design and it hides stained if it even stain being they're stain resistant. The no slip bottom is perfrt for work. A lil wider then expected but if I more wides to tight and it doesn't affect the comfort levels. Still fitting well enough even though it's true to it's with. Very happy water resistant, slip resistant, durability, length of life span, it's been months and they still look new. They're my work shoes it's a miracle. I was a little put off with the price but ended with better results then expected...
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Corum

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 12 hr shift
customer_reviews.text: Wore them one day around the house to break them in. Next day was my 12 hr shift as a RN on a busy med-surg Unit. They got me through 11 hrs before my feet started to hurt. After that I ware them all the time. They match my lime green stethoscope. Great product! Lightweight, vibrant color, sturdy too. I’d buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: S Preissler

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with certain foot issues!
customer_reviews.text: Even cuter in person. I have a neuromuscular disease that causes a lot of foot problems, one being very high arches. These shoes have a good arch support for me, so for others it is probably great. They also have a generous toe box. So far, they do seem to be water and stain resistant, but I haven't had very long. They came with 2 sets of laces (gray and white.) The only drawback I've discovered is they are a bit heavier than what I'm used to and are hot to wear in warmer climates.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Miller

customer_reviews.title: DAD SHOES BUT BEAUTIFUL. GETTHEM
customer_reviews.text: I groom dogs and BIG DOGS and they speak my feet all the time. And then my feet end up smelling and stuff when I get home These shoes have helped mot get them so soaked. They are so good!!! and they're cute. But a little bulky. I definitely look like a mom in my dad shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Casandra

customer_reviews.title: I have had other shoes last much longer.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these shoes for 2 months and they're already falling apart they are not the best of quality. However, they are slip resistant and they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: linda Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great for any Health Care worker
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect for work in healthcare as I do. I can wipe the shoe off with antibacterial wipes as needed without damaging the material. The toe box is a bit snug, but my feet are a bit wider also. I can wear them all day, but after the 10th hour my feet get a bit sore. I probably should have ordered a half size larger with wider feet. My husband is in healthcare as well and was a bit disappointed there were no options for men shoes in this model.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Heit

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly non slip
customer_reviews.text: As far as non slip shoes go, these could be much better. I work in a restaurant. While I haven't fallen (yet), I fear it's only a matter of time before I do. I find myself sliding on watery floors with each step I take. This should not happen with true non slip shoes. These shoes are also not very comfortable to wear for extended periods of time. They fit tighter and slightly smaller than other comparable shoes, and the sole inserts could be better. Not worth the money, in my opinion. There are other and better shoes out there, don't waste your time on these ones.
customer_reviews.author: lyzeria

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing various sketchers to work for the last two years - I really love this brand of shoes. So I really appreciate that you made sketchers specifically for medical workers. They fit like any other similar-shaped sketchers, so no comments there - everything just as expected. Love the design! Hope in future you add more of cute prints!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tongue is too short and small, couldnt deal
customer_reviews.text: I work in food service that requires slip resistant shoes. Most shoes are ugly and I went with these ones cause after reading up on them they sounded like a comfortable option and they were kinda normal looking. I work them for a couple weeks and I just cant put up with them anymore. The fit was just awkward and the tongue is way too short. I did however like how easy they were to wipe down and clean. I went back to my old crappy shoes with holes in them.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: None slip work shoes
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy with this shoe. It hurt my feet and took a while to get use to them. I kept using them with the hope they would feel better. While at work in the hospital I slipped meany times. That was the main reason for buying them. They advertised no slip. I do not recommend this shoes.
customer_reviews.author: janet loveamato

customer_reviews.title: Comfy work shoes after break in period
customer_reviews.text: I like the “relaxed fit” of these, my only issue was that for the first two weeks of wear, they were so stiff that I ended up with bruises on the tops of my toes from where the shoes creased as I stepped. Once they became broken in this stopped and are now pretty comfy. Very sturdy shoes
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable! Nothing like other Skechers memory foam shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Returned these right away. They were stiff, not like the memory foam Skechers I own. Uncomfortable to wear because of the stiff material. Cut into my ankles. No flex to the shoe. Pretty color but a disappointment. Glad I had free return. Would have liked the "rate features" section to include a category named "comfort and fit". Don't purchase these if you're expecting a shoe like other Skechers memory foam shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Dale K

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these shoes. Yes.... they are that good. On my feet 10 hours a day on a concrete floor as a busy veterinary technician I must have shoes to support feet,legs,back that can not slip in liquids on floors. They need to withstand the various substances they come in contact with and clean easily They are also durable. These do the job well. As a bonus? They are CUTE! I get many comments on the cat faces :-)
customer_reviews.author: Vet Tech

customer_reviews.title: Great except looked dry rotten
customer_reviews.text: These fit great for my wife foot with high arch. My chief complaint is they looked very old and had been sitting in on a shelf waiting for a person to buy them for a long time. You can see the day it arrived it looked like it was peeling and after 2 days of wear it shedded even more. I love the style and fit but I feel like I’m not going to get long wear out of them. I’ll update when I have to replace them so you’ll know how long before they aren’t usable anymore.
customer_reviews.author: S. Richard

customer_reviews.title: Saved my feet
customer_reviews.text: I wore these for a 12 hour shift and these are amazing! They are easy to clean and comfortable. I, previously, bought another styled leather pair of sketchers for work, wore them on several shifts and my feet were hurting badly after 4 hours, so I bought these shoes instead! They came faster than I expected and saved my feet. I didn’t even have to break them in to notice the difference in my feet. I hope they do not discontinue this shoe. It’s a great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Lovelysongbird

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Just okay. Bought them to have water resistant shoes when it’s a little damp outside and I don’t want my feet soaked walking around wet parks. But the shoes are very stiff and a bit uncomfortable, and don’t breathe well so my feet get really hot. I get that they’re made for work and durable for daily use, but after wearing half a dozen times I found I just didn’t really want to put them on. Love my other sketchers
customer_reviews.author: shopper9

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, supportive, durable, non slip (unlike your boyfriend)
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, comfortable and durable shoe. The kitties are so cute but don't scream crazy cat lady. I'm a vet tech and get daily compliments. I'm on my feet 10 hours a day. My back no longer hurts! They are water resistant! Hooray from a professional that gets peed on often! I am notorious for slipping and falling on any slightly damp service... in these shoes I was literally dancing across the freshly mopped lobby! Sooo impressed! Coworker has the dog printed shoes and loves them as well. A++
customer_reviews.author: Sterf C.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. They aren't the world's most comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. They aren't the world's most comfortable shoes, but they are much better than typical safety shoes sold at work places. The colors are cute, and any icing I've dropped on them comes off clean with no staining. The floor grip is good, but the low top rubs my ankles a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: TwoBugs

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, waterproof, not much arch support for flat feet.
customer_reviews.text: They are sturdy, and the waterproofing does work. I'm a surgical technologist and I've had blood drip on them, had saline from arthroscopic cases cover them, spilled saline on them, and my socks never got wet. They have a good grip to them. My only complaint, which is my own issue; I'm flat footed... there's not much support on them.
customer_reviews.author: svemm

customer_reviews.title: Great fit but horribly uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these. They fit great- no rubbing, blisters, or tightness. However, 4 hours into the first 12.5 hours nursing shift with these and all I could feel was intense pressure under my heels. These shoes offer little support and left me nearly limping by end of shift, I couldn’t wait to take them off. For reference I’m a normal weight female in my 30’s with slightly wide feet and a normal arch.
customer_reviews.author: Bonescbw

customer_reviews.title: Painful
customer_reviews.text: After working in a restaurant and wearing the same pair of non-slip shoes for two years, I decided to purchase a new pair. I chose to order these shoes and wore them for about a week. These shoes caused such intense pain in my feet, legs, and back that I ended up switching back to my old shoes. The only reason I am giving two stars for these shoes is because the seller was very gracious and allowed me to return the shoes due to the pain they caused me. They also look a lot nicer than most non-slip shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes after getting back into healthcare. I was looking for something that could handle being constantly on the move for 8+ hours. Boy, did these deliver on that! I run constantly from the time I clock in to the time I clock out and my feet barely hurt at all. There is a nice amount of memory foam and they stay tied all shift.
customer_reviews.author: CoffeeMama

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but doesn’t stay waterproof for long.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect design for me working in a veterinary clinic! I love how they are slip resistant, and the arch isn’t bad. Only thing is it *is* waterproof to an extent. It unfortunately stopped being waterproof about after 3rd or 4th time after getting wet.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable for work. I have another pair of sketchers which I had to get in a size 8.5. So, I ordered these in size 8.5 but they were too big. Was able to exchange for size 8 at no extra charge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoes Ever (black on black pair)
customer_reviews.text: I go the black on black pair for my wife and she absolutely loves them, and she’s picky when it comes to comfortable shoes. They have the memory foam insoles which make standing all day much more bearable, we got the last pair which were “used” but not actually used just a brand new pair that was sent back pretty much and I’m more the happy with my decision to go ahead and purchase them, I hope they restock the black in black pair soon because you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Like wearing a rubber shoe.
customer_reviews.text: It did not bend well at the top of the toe box. It dug into my toes like it was made of rubber instead all of the other Skechers shoes I own. The fit was on the large side as well. I have owned nothing but Skechers for over 12 years and these are not close to the quality or fit that I am used to. Exchanged them for other another Sketcher and am very happy. Such a shame because I really wanted the puppy print.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Mario

customer_reviews.title: The shoe let's your feet feel the breeze
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size 9 fits as expected. The mesh on it is breathable so you will feel the wind through your shoes. Great for summer time! The shoe is very light weight. It does have some arch support in them, however it doesn't last long. The bottom of the insoles wear out quick. All in all its a good sneaker
customer_reviews.author: San

customer_reviews.title: Very slip resistant and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly slip resistant. Easy to clean. Just a quick wipe and they are like new. I’ve had lighter weight shoes, but by no means do I find these heavy. Only thing I didn’t like was the insert. It was very comfortable on the heel and I liked it except for the fact that it was so thin on the ball part of my foot it felt like I was walking on concrete. Had to switch it out for another insert and I was goo to go. Would buy another pair when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Finley

customer_reviews.title: Best work shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair, I love them so much! This is the only shoe I wear to work now, and I am on my feet 10 hours a day, no pain when I get home!
customer_reviews.author: Punkin5979

customer_reviews.title: First pair uncomfortable Sketchers
customer_reviews.text: I love Sketchers. It's almost all I own. I'm a nurse and thought these were perfect! But they hurt my feet. I didn't feel the support in them. I'm really bummed out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit. Needed non slip that are not ugly.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter 15 wore them for summer job. Said not the most comfortable, but were ok to wear. She had to have non slip and I think she just really wanted to wear Nike.......
customer_reviews.author: magnus4u

customer_reviews.title: Love the color! Looks just as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I love these, but only after I added a goga mat insole. The memory foam did nothing & felt like walking on a slab of concrete. I have never felt such a hard shoe bottom in my life! My feet hurt so bad the 1st 2 wears. Replaced the insole with a Skechers goga mat insole & that made all the difference. My feet don’t hurt at all now.
customer_reviews.author: Leapin Lizzard

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sneakers for work. I work in a very busy hospital doing 3-12 hours shifts, basically standing all day with a lot of walking. They fit perfect and have extra room for my toes! My feet don’t hurt like before, and i get a lot of compliments. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: La Nena D

customer_reviews.title: Put me in a Whimsical mood!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe my eyes when I saw these Skechers! I love Skechers...and I LOVE dogs! What a find! I used my Amazon gift certificate to purchase these Skechers and was not a bit disappointed! The quality is great, the fit is perfect for my 5M foot and I have comfort in walking! I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but missing logo on one shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Comfy shoes. Half of the logo on one shoe was missing, and the half that was there fell off. The shoes are still funtional, but I worry what else got looked over during quality check. I will update if anything else goes wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Howler

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Sketchers for several years, I usually love them. My problem with other shoes is that they had seams that run across my knuckle on my small toe, these did the exact same thing. Also there was arch support but it was in the wrong place for my foot and they were very hard and stiff, unlike what I am used to in a sketcher. If you like the firm tight fight and don’t mind where the arch support sits, these are for you.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Healthcare workers, these are 100% worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These are FANTASTIC. I'm an orthodontic assistant, and these are perfect for my longer 9-hour days. I had really bad heel pain, and after buying and wearing these, my feet are so much better! Great support, great fit, cute colors, awesome price. Great all around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big for shoe sizes in wide
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear 6 1/2 but ordered 1/2 smaller in wide as suggested from some reviews. The shoes looked huge and so is the fit. Not happy. I probably needed to ordered one size smaller. I dont like to deal with returns so hopefully I have someone to give them to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Conversation shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I am a groomer in a vet clinic and I get so many compliments on these shoes! The non slip bottom is helpful and my feet dont hurt in these. they have a nice spacious toe box so your feet dont feel squished. I can stand all day and not be sore!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia K Resig

customer_reviews.title: Fun comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I have bought. I'm a cook in a care facility and am on my feet for 8 hours a day. They're comfortable and the I cute cat print is fun. I've had many comments on them. I've also had the puppy print ones.
customer_reviews.author: sillk

customer_reviews.title: Relieves planters fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: I have planters fasciitis and have been limping and crying for the last year and a half. I am on my feet anywhere from 5-7 hours a day. I have tried many shoes just to end up transferring pain from my feet to my lower back. I have been wearing these for over a month now and OMG the difference!!! I love them!!! No more ice packs as soon as I get home or taking pain relievers. The prices are beyond awesome too. I paid twice as much for a pair at academy sport just to throw them in the closet because they hurt me. Definitely buy these. You will not regret it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 6&1/2 with the dog prints because normally that’s what I wear in scketchers. They are about a fingertip to big but that’s my only complaint. I am a kennel tech at a local Er Vet. Wore them right out the box to work today and I have to say I absolutely love them! Super comfortable and my feet stAyed dry when cleaning outside kennels! Didn’t have to worry about slippery wet floors! I give 5 stars! I will be ordering the cats as soon as my size is available!!
customer_reviews.author: maryann oyoque

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and cuteness.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as gift for daughter. She volunteers at the Humane Society and also fosters puppies, so she needs something that can stand up to the kennel environment. She loves the shoes! Sketchers are pretty comfortable, these fit her perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Q.

customer_reviews.title: They make you smile.  Buy the dog shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These dog shoes are so cute. Very comfortable to wear. All the staff at my veterinarian office loved them and wanted to know where to get them. I also bought the flats and will be purchasing the slip ones when back in stock. Dog shoes who would have ever thought I would buy shoes with dogs on the. But they make me smile. Worth the smiles.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Behrens

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are amazing. I had a different style of sketchers slip ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing. I had a different style of sketchers slip resistant shoes and I thought they weren’t excellent. They discontinued those shoes and I was sad that I might not find another non slip that was so comfortable. These are better than my old style! Lightweight and very comfortable for the long hours on my feet at work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looked cute but is not comfortable.. Im so surprised the memory foam is too thin very disappointed thought i needed to break them in but thats not working the most uncomfortable shoes ever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute dog design, very comfy, supportive work shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a Vet Tech and bought these shoes because I loved the cute dog design and the awesome features of the shoes. Not only are they cute, they are the best work shoe I have ever had. They are so comfortable and help keep my feet comfy on long 10 hour day’s on my feet. I definitely want to buy a pair for daily use. I love these!
customer_reviews.author: The White family

customer_reviews.title: Ok shoe, but Not for my feet
customer_reviews.text: The back of this shoe kept hitting my Achilles’ tendon. It hurt after few hours and my arch wasn’t supported. This shoe is ok, but not for someone with plantar fasciitis. If you are a nurse, or nurse aide know after few hours your feet will hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Jey

customer_reviews.title: uncomfortable shoe/ not holding up well
customer_reviews.text: There is NO cushion in these shoes. Fit well but hurt my back to walk on hard floors all day. I have now been wearing them for about 2 months. Shoe is peeling on top and looks terrible. I will need to replace as they look to shredded to wear at my job.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Renee

customer_reviews.title: WOW!  These shoes are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Although I'm already a big fan of Bob's shoes, I find them lacking in the support area. These shoes turned that completely around! I was on my feet non-stop from 6 am - 9 pm yesterday and my feet didn't even ache or throb. These shoes are so comfortable, I can fit my othotics in them, and there is plenty of room so that I can still wear socks - my toes are not crunched together at all! I would buy these shoes again.
customer_reviews.author: Craig S. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Pretty shoe, heavier than I anticipated, great for medical field professionals
customer_reviews.text: I am a RN but did not buy these shoes for work, but for my work outs. They are so pretty but are a very firm shoe. The no slip soles are great for wet situations. I am wearing them now and they are very comfortable. They are heavier in weight than my other Skecher shoes. The fabric has an easy wipe off non-absorbent type finish so that's great for potentially "messy" situations as we nurses can get into at times.
customer_reviews.author: NANCY BOWEN

customer_reviews.title: Not for long shifts
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are hard, stiff and not enough support or cushion for long shifts. The memory foam insole dug in to the side of my foot. I could tell instantly when I tried these on that they would not work for my 11 hour shifts. Memory foam works in casual shoes but not in work shoes.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Supportive and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy shoes! I’m on my feet all day and they feel supported. The anti-slip bottom works great too with absolutely no slipping around on water. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cap

customer_reviews.title: Dog walker approved
customer_reviews.text: I love them. I ordered cats and dogs. I sent find then heavy as others have said. I got caught in a downpour and my feet stayed dry. I'm a dog walker and I feel like these give great support. Enough toe room and protections to keep my ingrown toe nicks at bay. I tend to have problems if shoes are not roomy enough or if my feet get too hot. I'm a dog walker and easily walk 5 miles a day. If they start to come apart as other said I will update but they seem durable to me.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Support only lasted 2 months working 30 hours on my feet.
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes in early December and they’re hurting my feet now, the end of January. The dog print is cute and I get complimented a lot. But I was only working about 25-35 hours a week on my feet in retail and the support hasn’t lasted. I’ll keep them for casual use. I was going to purchase another pair just to get me by but I realized when I originally purchased them they were on sale for around $20 but now that I realize they’re $50 I have no interest. If you’re going to spend $50 on shoes, buy some Nike, which I’m going back to.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rosa

customer_reviews.title: I'm going to order a second pair!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for work because we are required to wear slip resistant shoes, and I like them so much that I'm going to order an second pair for my own! They are so cute, extremely comfortable, and I have gotten so many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Perry

customer_reviews.title: Might be fine for others....
customer_reviews.text: ...but for me, I have been a fan of Skechers for quite some time because they seemed to fit snugly, if not a tad on the narrow side, and the memory foam give a cushy walk. This shoe felt a little wide and almost like it didn't want to bend with my toes. Someone with a wider stronger foot may find this more to their liking.
customer_reviews.author: CeeBee

customer_reviews.title: emory foam non-existent in these shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes feel like you have 2x4s strapped to your feet. They look good and the are slip resistant but Im on my feet for 6 hours a day at work and my feet are hurting 1/2 way thru my shift. The memory foam is not existent in these shoes even buying extra insoles did not help. Should have returned them!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Worse shoes ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are worse than cheap Walmart shoes. Not comfortable at all! The worse part is they’re made with something that causes your feet to smell rotten!!! I have never had an issue with smelly feet til these. My feet actually burn while wearing them!! I’ve had them a little over a month and now I’m having to buy more because of the smell issues. I thought my feet would adjust to the comfort but that’s not happened and even if they did I can’t stand how they burn my feet and smell. Worse shoes I have ever bought. I normally LOVE sketchers!! Not these!!
customer_reviews.author: Hope Rose

customer_reviews.title: They are of good quality. I have faith they will last me ...
customer_reviews.text: They are of good quality. I have faith they will last me for months to come. I am on my feet all day. And as all new shoes they need to be worked in. So that is understandable. And I'm still working then in, and I have flat feet so shoes are hard for me to buy offline without trying them on first, but I am so busy I don't have time to go hunting for a good pair. So I took a chance and it paid off. Can't wait to see how long they will last me.. For such a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Donice Oxford

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable often complimented
customer_reviews.text: For some reason the dog pattern was available in Prime and the cat pattern was not and cats were priced $10 higher. I needed to upgrade my walking shoes since my pandemic closed gym has me out walking every day. She shoes are great for walking.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. DAVIS

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy shoes
customer_reviews.text: I work in restaurants and I am on my feet all day. These have been perfect for me. The slip resistance is a big help as well. I do have very high arches so I wear special inserts, however I feel the support these have is probably fine for people with normal feet. I like these a lot and will order more when these wear out eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy ! Slip resistant !!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy !! I love them !! They got a lot of attention for sure my first day of work ! Im a vet tech so the theme fits my job well!! True to size !! Arrived pretty quick ! I find it even more comfy to wear with ankle compression socks :)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley m

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is inconsistant. The one pair I bought was close to perfect. So I bought a second pair in a different color. The second one is seems smaller or the toe box is lower? not sure which. Hopefully won't hurt my toes.
customer_reviews.author: CleenHeadhunter

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: A hair wider than I thought but probably better since I stand a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Halvorsen

customer_reviews.title: Bottom sole is falling apart
customer_reviews.text: Bottom sole is falling apart (9/5/2019) and window to return was 8/29. I would not buy again as the bottom sole is already falling apart and I wore them a total of 4 times since I bought them. So disappointed! Would really like my money back, but I guess it's too late.
customer_reviews.author: LJB

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes comfortable and mon slip for work. I'm on my feet all day as a preschool teacher and always running around. So far the memory foam is very comfortable. 8 felt they were a tiny bit loose but I tried them tighter and they work well. I like the extra set of shoe laces they came with too
customer_reviews.author: Dmc

customer_reviews.title: Doggo shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for working in an animal clinic for about four months now- they are AWESOME! They are so easy to wipe off and the non slip is essential for my area where I work. I don't have crazy long shifts, but they work for my 8 hour days, my feet don't hurt at all when I get home. I ordered a half size up as well :) highly recommend, clients love them!
customer_reviews.author: Espyeight

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes...I have 3 pairs and I wear them to work 12 hours a day and walking non stop...I was so surprised because it is very difficult to find shoes that do not hurt my feet even within a couple hours. I hope I am able to keep getting these
customer_reviews.author: Kim Hoot

customer_reviews.title: Did not feel good to wear.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this. Something about it did not feel right. It was a little too stiff for me and the back part seemed too high. It was not comfortable at all...which is sad because I loved how it looked. I'm a Skechers fan but these shoes failed for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: So comfy! I love that it is slip resistant, I have slipped and fallen in other shoes and it is so nice to have the confidence that I can go about my work or just walk without the fear of falling! THANK YOU!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing work shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing. I do delivery and I've been looking for a shoe that hit all the right things that I needed. They're comfortable, they're slip resistant, they're reinforced in all the right places and even while delivering in torrential rain, they kept my feet dry. Just awesome shoes. I hope Skechers never discontinues this model because these are the ultimate work shoes. I will never be able to fill this gap ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Beccers

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love skecher's shoes. Definitely require breaking them in. Slightly heavier than I typically like
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Karoly

customer_reviews.title: surprised at how well made these are
customer_reviews.text: I have other Ketchers that are comfy for casual walking...but doesnt quite cut it for constantly being on my feet. THESE DO THE TRICK!!! Love the feel, support, and they are nice looking shoes!!!
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as reviews suggested ex
customer_reviews.text: Yes they are resistant to liquids. these shoes are not flexible and cushy but the soles are thick so I'm hoping with time they will help prevent leg fatigue. I walk on concrete all day long in a warehouse and needed comfortable shoes, time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Two left feet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this twice. First time seemed like it was two left shoes! So had it replaced. Then replacement was curved incorrectly on right foot by toe. I suspect these are seconds with defects that are being bought in China.
customer_reviews.author: GaiaGal

customer_reviews.title: Great! Comfy AND Cute non-slip shoes for a change!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Love these shoes! The fit slightly larger than expected - but nothing is worse that too-small shoes so I am happy with the fit! Have to wear non-slip shoes for work and hate how ugly and expensive they usually are. These are cute, comfy and meet the requirements for work!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleighh92

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat roomy in the toe area
customer_reviews.text: I have decided that I do like the shoes, even though they are more roomy in the toes. They are a little stiff, too. I do like Skechers, and like the sole of the shoe. I have only just been wearing them for a week, and I am growing to like them and how they fit. It will take awhile to see how they wear over the year.
customer_reviews.author: Aome

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work out for me but cute as heck!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the style and the print was just what I was looking for. Unfortunately, the tongue was a problem. It was short and not well padded and poked me in the ankle. I had to return the shoes. 😥
customer_reviews.author: Nannycola

customer_reviews.title: amazing shoe
customer_reviews.text: i love the desing of these and with the removable insoles i can wear my custom inserts and brace with this type of shoe ! i didnt have to settle for a shoe i didnt like the style of because mine fit in this perfectly
customer_reviews.author: kara

customer_reviews.title: Stiff as a rock! Hurts my feet like crazy
customer_reviews.text: Stiff as can be! I can't wear them, wish I would have returned for something more comfortable , they are the stiffest tennis shoes I have ever seen, wouldn't recommend these at all! My feet hurt when I tried to wear them :(
customer_reviews.author: SKIPPYONE

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I’m a nurse who works 12 hour shifts. The first 2 days they gave me HORRIBLE shin splints. But after that they were great. I have a fairly flat foot and needed to get use to The support. I can tell a major difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes!! Skechers Women's Comfort Flex Sr Hc Pro Health Care Professional Shoe,navy/pink,7.5 M US They are perfect for my busy 12 hours as a labor and delivery nurse.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes for pet grooming:)
customer_reviews.text: I'm a dog groomer, on my feet 8 to 10 hours a day, and these are the most comfortable shoes I've ever worked in! They fit perfect, not too firm not too soft and for the first time in forever MY FEET STAY DRY ALL DAY :) Also, relevant for dog groomers, dog hair does not stick to these shoes, neither the sole or the upper. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Shea Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Never slip never get your toes wet
customer_reviews.text: I like the product however I feel like it needs more support on the inside of the foot I had to purchase insoles but it has helped me a lot in my everyday work. I have tried it out during walk through water never slipping they are completely waterproof I have walked straight through a mud puddle in the rain and never got in my socks wet the colors are amazing and the overall aesthetic of the shoe is good.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Painful
customer_reviews.text: Something is wrong with these shoes. My feet hurt terribly after wearing a few hours. Never had a pair of shoes hurt my feet so bad
customer_reviews.author: lizzard

customer_reviews.title: Great work shoe
customer_reviews.text: I am happy. Felt great from the start I leave these at work d/t covid. I think the the reenforcement is likely to make the toe and heal a little stiffer but I am content
customer_reviews.author: Maureen R

customer_reviews.title: Everything is perfect except the squeaking
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable Cute shoe Perfect for nursing But VERY squeaky when I walk but if you work somewhere overnight when people are sleeping I do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

product_meta.title: Skechers Women's Comfort Flex Sr Hc Pro Health Care Professional Shoe
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top" from arch
